name: Micro Market
overview: Read the Daily Empire, get the stock tips and make your trades. The player starts with an amount of cash on hand and can purchase from the six available stocks. The player can buy or sell as many stocks as they wish per turn. Each of the stocks randomly increases or decreases each turn. The game ends if the player runs out of money. You can play with up to four human or CPU players, the computer player is an absolute swine and will give you a run for your money.
